name: .TCD File Extension
summary: Learn about .TCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: 2D or 3D Drawing created by the Mac Deluxe version of TurboCAD, a CAD application that allows users to draft architectural and manufacturing designs; contains a drawing, which includes objects, text, lighting properties, and measurements.

content: The TCD file is used for storing your mechanical and manufacturing component designs. The extension is used by the Mac Deluxe of TurboCAD whereas the .TCP file extension is used by TurboCAD Mac Pro.
NOTE: To create the TCP file, select File â†’ Save As....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
